articles.title: iQOO Z7, Oppo Find N2 Flip to Samsung Galaxy A54-check smartphone launches in March 2023 - HT Tech
articles.description: If you are planning to buy a new smartphone, then maybe you should wait! The smartphone market is all set to welcome impressive new smartphones - from iQOO Z7, Oppo Find N2 Flip to Samsung Galaxy A54 – check the full list.

articles.title: OpenAI's GPT-4 'to launch next week' - Microsoft Germany - Tech Monitor
articles.description: Rumours about ChatGPT maker OpenAI's next large language AI model have been swirling for some time. We may not have much longer to wait.
articles.content: GPT-4, the much anticipated new large language AI model from ChatGPT-maker OpenAI, could be released next week according to Microsoft Germanys CTO. The model is likely to be exponentially more powerf… [+2652 chars]

articles.title: Nanotube sensors can detect and distinguish gibberellin plant hormones - Tech Explorist
articles.description: The nondestructive nanosensors could have wide applications in agricultural science.
articles.content: Gibberellins (GAs) are a family of phytohormones that are essential for plant development but are challenging to recognize due to their identical chemical structures. MIT researchers build and manufa… [+5657 chars]
